data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio TSM Corona.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Santos Laguna's Alan Cervantes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 5, Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Queretaro.
Santos Laguna push forward at Estadio TSM Corona and Doria gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Queretaro defence.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 8, Martin Rea for Queretaro has been booked by Fernando Guerrero and receives a first yellow card.
In Torreon Santos Laguna drive forward through Diego Valdes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 13, Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Jose van Rankin scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio TSM Corona.
Great play from Adrian Lozano to set up the goal.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 16, At Estadio TSM Corona, Adrian Lozano has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 17, Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Santos Laguna.
Julio Furch (Santos Laguna) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro's Fernando Madrigal breaks free at Estadio TSM Corona. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Nicolas Albarracin (Queretaro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fernando Guerrero awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
Gonzalo Montes (Queretaro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero awards the away team a throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 35, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Fernando Guerrero signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Hugo Silveira is booked for the away team.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
In the minute 43, Fernando Guerrero signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Diego Valdes for Santos Laguna drives towards goal at Estadio TSM Corona. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, An attacking Queretaro player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio TSM Corona.
Hugo Silveira scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
The second-half is underway at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 46, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a first substitution, with Irving Zurita replacing Nicolas Albarracin.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Torreon.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 52, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Fernando Guerrero.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 54, Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Adrian Lozano with Walter Sandoval. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 57, Eduardo Aguirre is replacing Julio Furch for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Queretaro.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santos Laguna attack but Octavio Rivero's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 64, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Alex Diego is making the team's second substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Francisco Da Costa replacing Hugo Silveira.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Queretaro throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
In the minute 66, Santos Laguna needs to be cautious. Queretaro have an attacking throw-in.
Fernando Guerrero awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Francisco Da Costa for Queretaro is whistled offside.
In the minute 67, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Octavio Rivero heads in to make it 2-1 at Estadio TSM Corona.
That's a fine assist from Bryan Garnica.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Santos Laguna.
Queretaro are pushing forward but Fernando Madrigal's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
In the minute 70, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Queretaro.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 75, Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Fernando Madrigal with Angel Sepulveda.
Fernando Guerrero awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Santos Laguna make their third substitution with Jair Gonzalez replacing Bryan Garnica.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Omar Arellano is on a sub for Martin Rea for Queretaro.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 86, Free kick Santos Laguna.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio TSM Corona.
Fernando Guerrero signals a Queretaro throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Fernando Guerrero signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Santos Laguna.
Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Diego Valdes (Santos Laguna) gets a yellow card.
Jorge Guillermo Almada is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Ulises Rivas replacing Diego Valdes.
